context: In 2024-2025, Manhattan Associates maintains 1.07% market share in supply chain management, competing with 167 tools in this category. The company ranks 6th among 746 active competitors. Manhattan is recognized as a 17-time Leader in Gartner's Magic Quadrant for WMS, known for cloud-native, microservices-based warehouse management solutions. Over 1,064 companies globally use Manhattan Associates, with 74.77% of customers based in the United States. The competitive landscape is dominated by SAP's multiple products controlling significant market share, while Blue Yonder remains the top direct competitor. The market has seen increased emphasis on AI-powered solutions (ToolsGroup, Blue Yonder) and cloud-native platforms. Competition comes from three main categories: (1) enterprise software giants (SAP, Oracle, Infor), (2) specialized supply chain platforms (E2open, GT Nexus, Descartes), and (3) automation vendors with software offerings (SSI SCHAEFER, Honeywell Intelligrated, KNAPP).
